biotools.summary: R package for analyzing large Affymetrix data sets which allows to analyze 100-1,000s of arrays of various chip types, e.g. expression arrays, SNP chips, exon arrays and so on.

bioschemas.name: aroma.affymetrix
bioschemas.summary: R package for analyzing large Affymetrix data sets which allows to analyze 100-1,000s of arrays of various chip types, e.g. expression arrays, SNP chips, exon arrays and so on.
